Package ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.trading

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TradeState
    class TradeState uses the State Pattern to manage the various states a Trade can be in.
    TradeTileFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener
    This interface must be implemented by activities that contain this fragment to allow an interaction in this fragment to be communicated to the activity and potentially other fragments contained in that activity.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Trade
    Model which represents a single trade.
    TradeList
    TradeList represents a collection of trades a user is currently involved in.
    TradeOfferComposeActivity
    The view portion of the TradeOfferCompose triplet.
    TradeOfferComposeController
    The controller portion of the TradeOfferCompose triplet.
    TradeOfferHistoryFragment
    View that shows the history of all past and pending trades for a user.
    TradeOfferReviewActivity
    class TradeOfferReviewActivity is the View for reviewing a trade which has been offered to the current user.
    TradeOfferReviewController
    Controller for reviewing a trade which has been offered to the user.
    TradeStateAccepted
    class TradeStateAccepted implements TradeState
    TradeStateCancelled
    class TradeStateCancelled implements TradeState
    TradeStateComposing
    class TradeStateComposing implements TradeState
    TradeStateDeclined
    class TradeStateDeclined implements TradeState
    TradeStateOffered
    class TradeStateOffered implements TradeState
    TradeTileController
    Created by ross on 15-10-29.
    TradeTileFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
